name: Nuts!: Infinite Forest Run
summary:
Help Jake, your nimble squirrel hero and his squirrel friend Miranda dodge branches and climb to new heights on the majestic Infinitree!
“A clever new vertical endless-runner that will have you going Nuts!” - 148 Apps
“Nuts! is an adorable, fast-paced, and addictive iOS platformer” - Slide to Play
TILT
Dodge branches OR find special powerups and smash right through them!
UPGRADE
Collect coins to unlock upgrades in the forest store.
CONQUER
Complete over 40 fun and exciting challenges.
Nuts! is Game Center and iCloud enabled.
What are you waiting for? Get Nuts!
Search for our other award-winning games: TowerMadness and Zombie Gunship
